items.title: ABC Shuts Down Pro-Leftist Polling Site That Claimed Harris Had Better Chance Than Trump
items.description: ABC News' shutdown of FiveThirtyEight shows leftist pollsters are losing their grip on the public narrative.

items.title: We Need To Ban Idiots From Using Historical Analogies
items.description: Idiots like Russell Moore should abstain from using historical analogies in their pitiful attempts to influence the public discourse.

items.title: Judicial Org Ignored Threats To Judges Until ‘Threats’ Affected Constitution Haters
items.description: There are too many examples of judicial corruption for anyone to believe the judiciary is the one segment in the world free of malfeasance.
